name: Magnetic Button Shirt
description: Classic button-down shirt with hidden magnetic closures for easy one-handed dressing. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

name: Seated-Fit Adaptive Jeans
description: Specially designed jeans with higher back rise and seated fit for wheelchair users. Features easy-pull tabs and elastic waistband.

name: Sensory-Friendly T-Shirt
description: Ultra-soft, tagless t-shirt made from bamboo fabric. Flat seams reduce irritation and provide all-day comfort.

name: Side-Zip Pants
description: Comfortable pants with full-length side zippers for easier dressing. Perfect for limited mobility or post-surgery recovery.

name: Easy-Access Jacket
description: Stylish jacket with magnetic closures and extended zipper pull for easier gripping. Water-resistant and lightweight.

name: Hands-Free Slip-On Shoes
description: Innovative slip-on shoes with collapsible heel for easy entry. Extra-wide opening and adjustable fit.
